DOC.detailed_description: A Randomized , Placebo-controlled , Double-Blind Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety two Doses Intra-Articular Injection Ampion™ Adults pain due osteoarthritis knee . The primary trial objective evaluate great efficacy 10 mL Ampion™ versus 10 mL placebo 4 mL Ampion™ versus 4 mL placebo intra-articular ( IA ) injection improve knee pain , apply patient suffer OA knee .
